description: Detects usage of the Get-ADComputer cmdlet to collect computer information and output it to a file
false_positives: Legitimate admin scripts may use the same technique, it's better to exclude specific computers or users who execute these commands or scripts often
name: Computer Discovery And Export Via Get-ADComputer Cmdlet
query: ((process.executable.text:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe) OR winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("PowerShell.EXE" OR "pwsh.dll")) AND (process.command_line.text:*Get\-ADComputer\ * AND process.command_line.text:*\ \-Filter\ \*) AND process.command_line.text:(*\ >\ * OR *Out\-File* OR *Set\-Content* OR *Add\-Content*))
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
